name: o4-mini-deep-research
description: Lightweight deep research model that's faster and more cost-efficient than o3-deep-research, ideal for latency-sensitive research applications while maintaining high quality.
notes: Released June 2025. Powered by specialized variant of o4-mini for deep research tasks. Significantly cheaper than o3-deep-research. Available via Responses API with background mode support. Balances speed and research depth.
